definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: It seemed that they walked down that hill-slope for a long way, but perhaps it was a short way;
sentences.chinese: 他們似乎在山坡上走了很久，但也許只有一會兒。

sentences.english: A hillside studio-house in Ushimado , Japan, by Tezuka Architects.
sentences.chinese: 山坡工作室家中牛窗，日本，由手冢建築師。

sentences.english: Only one of them old, the hill that was nearest to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 只有一位年老者，在離天堂最近的山坡上。

sentences.english: Small stones rolled down the hillside as they ran up.
sentences.chinese: 他們跑上山坡，同時有些小石子滾了下來。

sentences.english: It is still inconceivably first-rate fun on spruced slopes.
sentences.chinese: 它仍然令人不可置信，一流的山坡上聳立的樂趣。

sentences.english: Factory buildings spread out over the hillside.
The wine from Côtes de Bourg is quite tannic with strong aromas of red fruits.
sentences.chinese: 波爾山坡的葡萄酒就着強烈的果香而且收縮感強。

sentences.english: The slopes of the hills were planted with tea bushes.
Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏山坡上，有一大羣豬喫食。

sentences.english: Millstones had been cut and laboriously sledged down the rough mountainsides .
sentences.chinese: 石磨被琢好，然後費力用雪橇運下那崎嶇不平的山坡。

sentences.english: Zip-up hip pockets are perfect on the slopes or in the city.
sentences.chinese: 拉鍊臀部口袋完美的山坡上或在城市。

sentences.english: The brave cowboy is herding a flock of sheep to descend a slope.
sentences.chinese: 那位勇敢的牧童把一羣羊趕下山坡。

sentences.english: Tenant farmers grow mushrooms on the hillsides.
sentences.chinese: 承租人在山坡地種香菇。

sentences.english: The people of Yenan live in cave houses carved into the slopes of dry loessial hills.
sentences.chinese: 延安人住在乾燥的黃土山坡上挖的窯洞裏。

sentences.english: Brilliantly green coastline reveals tree-house villas perched on a jungled hillside.
sentences.chinese: 出色的綠色海岸線發現山坡上蓊棲息的樹屋別墅。

sentences.english: Sheep and cattle graze on the hillsides.
sentences.chinese: 山坡上有羊羣和牛羣在喫草。

definition: halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
